languages.text: "Я раскрою истину уже очень скоро — но не здесь, не в месте, где, кажется, угнездилось зло... Наберись терпения, элантах — и верь мне".
"I will reveal the truth very soon, but not here, not in the place where it seems evil has made its nest... Have patience, elantach — and trust me."
languages.original_text: "Я раскрою истину уже очень скоро — но не здесь, не в месте, где, кажется, угнездилось зло... Наберись терпения, элантах — и верь мне".

traits.locale_text: "I will reveal the truth very soon, but not here, not in the place where it seems evil has made its nest... Have patience, el'antar — and trust me."
"I will reveal the truth very soon, but not here, not in the place where it seems evil has made its nest... Have patience, el'antar — and trust me."
"I will reveal the truth very soon, but not here, not in the place where it seems evil has made its nest... Have patience, el'antar — and trust me."
"I will reveal the truth very soon, but not here, not in the place where it seems evil has made its nest... Have patience, elantach — and trust me."

languages.text: 「真実はすぐ明らかになる。だが、ここではない。邪悪が巣くうと思しき場所だ…。辛抱強く待って欲しい、エランタ…そして我を信じて欲しい」
languages.original_text: "I will reveal the truth very soon, but not here, not in the place where it seems evil has made its nest... Have patience, elantach — and trust me."

traits.locale_text: 「真実はすぐ明らかになる。だが、ここではない。邪悪が巣くうと思しき場所だ…。辛抱強く待って欲しい、エランタ…そして我を信じて欲しい」

languages.text: “我很快就会揭开真相，但这里不行，不能在这个恶魔的巢穴之中……耐心些，外界人。还有，相信我。”
languages.original_text: "I will reveal the truth very soon, but not here, not in the place where it seems evil has made its nest... Have patience, elantach — and trust me."

traits.locale_text: “我很快就会揭开真相，但这里不行，不能在这个恶魔的巢穴之中……耐心些，外界人。还有，相信我。”

languages.text: «Te revelaré la verdad muy pronto, pero no aquí, donde ha anidado el mal... Sé paciente, elantach, y confía en mí».
languages.original_text: "I will reveal the truth very soon, but not here, not in the place where it seems evil has made its nest... Have patience, elantach — and trust me."

traits.locale_text: «Te revelaré la verdad muy pronto, pero no aquí, donde ha anidado el mal... Sé paciente, elantach, y confía en mí».

languages.text: "Ich werde die Wahrheit sehr bald offenbaren, aber nicht hier, nicht an dem Ort, wo das Böse sich sein Nest gebaut hat ... Habt Geduld, Elantach – und vertraut mir."
languages.original_text: "I will reveal the truth very soon, but not here, not in the place where it seems evil has made its nest... Have patience, elantach — and trust me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde die Wahrheit sehr bald offenbaren, aber nicht hier, nicht an dem Ort, wo das Böse sich sein Nest gebaut hat ... Habt Geduld, Elantach – und vertraut mir."

languages.text: « Je vous révélerai toute la vérité très bientôt, mais pas ici. Pas à l'endroit où le mal semble avoir fait son nid. Patience, elantach... Faites-moi confiance. »
languages.original_text: "I will reveal the truth very soon, but not here, not in the place where it seems evil has made its nest... Have patience, elantach — and trust me."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous révélerai toute la vérité très bientôt, mais pas ici. Pas à l'endroit où le mal semble avoir fait son nid. Patience, elantach... Faites-moi confiance. »

languages.text: "Gerçeği çok yakında açık edeceğim ama burada, kötülüğün kendine yuva kurduğu bir yerde olmaz. Sabırlı ol ve güven bana elantach."
languages.original_text: "I will reveal the truth very soon, but not here, not in the place where it seems evil has made its nest... Have patience, elantach — and trust me."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçeği çok yakında açık edeceğim ama burada, kötülüğün kendine yuva kurduğu bir yerde olmaz. Sabırlı ol ve güven bana elantach."
